channel.title: Question booth
channel.description: well i was hoping there was some way to make an npc say a custom command. This is my idea. I want for someone to say a command such as ::qon player1 this will make the npc say "player1 is accepting questions at booth 1." then another command that would be ::qoff player1 and the npc would say "Noone is currently answering questions at booth 1." and i was hoping it could be for two different npcs. Thanks i know this is a lot to ask for but i was hoping someone could help me with this. Oh the npcs i would want is npc 979 and npc 980.

item.title: Question booth
item.dc:creator: @chesslemac chesslemac
